Body: Possible Duplicate:  Unwanted folders showing up in Gallery. Can they be removed?  My Album contains Camera Pics and the icons of other applications. Those icons are there in my SD Card. I took back up of other applications using some Backup applications tool. It stores the icons also. I had to delete them manually to separate the icons and my camera pics. Is there any way to exclude the icons and include only Camera pics in Album ?
Title: How to Ignore the Icons in Camera Album?

history.Text: My Album contains Camera Pics and the icons of other applications. Those icons are there in my SD Card. I took back up of other applications using some Backup applications tool. It stores the icons also. I had to delete them manually to separate the icons and my camera pics. Is there any way to exclude the icons and include only Camera pics in Album ?
How to Ignore the Icons in Camera Album?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [unwanted folders showing up in gallery (bejeweled 2). can they be removed?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/7866/unwanted-folders-showing-up-in-gallery-bejeweled-2-can-they-be-removed)  My Album contains Camera Pics and the icons of other applications. Those icons are there in my SD Card. I took back up of other applications using some Backup applications tool. It stores the icons also. I had to delete them manually to separate the icons and my camera pics. Is there any way to exclude the icons and include only Camera pics in Album ?
